category.name: Product Structure.Collaboration Context
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ALLOC_Target_Occurrence_Types
preference.preference_description: Specifies a list of components that can participate as target components for a given Allocation type. The components in this preference are the valid Sub-Types of Allocations and valid sub-types of objects that can be instantiated in the Product Structure Editor.
